name: plang-compiler
description: P_Lang - A programming language faster than C, running in browser via WebAssembly

scripts.build:wasm: emcc plang_compiler_wasm.c -o docs/plang.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_init_compiler", "_run_plang", "_clear_output", "_get_output", "_malloc", "_free"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap", "allocateUTF8", "UTF8ToString"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -O2

author: Priyam-ops
